data.name: Learn to automate tasks & save Time & Money
data.summary:
Lessons from Grab’s driver onboarding automation

Field research to analyse what to automate next
Making your app user flow easy
How Grab reduced driver onboarding time from 13 days to 24 hours

Dividing tech review work based on expertise to increase performance
How Grab reduced reviewer headcount to 20% & saved costs

Creating tools for fraud detection
How Grab created fraud detection models to track drivers & reduced frauds by 4X

What to use: Third party or in-house solutions or both
How in-house training for driver onboarding helps Grab provide better customer experience
data.speakers:
Yogesh Madaan, Senior Software Engineer at Grab

He has worked on the prototyping & designing of automation tools to save engineers’ time
Designed personalised users’ feed microservice to increase engagement
Worked on the drivers’ app to ship on various business requirements and features
Prior to Grab, he worked at Limetray
